# Testing owl:maxCardinality (cls-maxc2) 

PREFIX bbc:<http://www.bbc.co.uk/ontologies/bbc/>  
PREFIX rdf:<http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> 
PREFIX owl:<http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> 
PREFIX rdfs:<http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> 
PREFIX xsd:<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> 
PREFIX core:<http://www.bbc.co.uk/ontologies/coreconcepts/> 
PREFIX cwork:<http://www.bbc.co.uk/ontologies/creativework/> 
PREFIX ldbc:<http://www.ldbc.eu/ontologies/sempub#>

INSERT DATA {
  <http://www.bbc.co.uk/things/creativework-cls-maxc2-constraint#cwork-id1> a cwork:BlogPost ;  
    cwork:thumbnail <http://www.bbc.co.uk/things/creativework-cls-maxc2-constraint#thumbnail-id1> ;
    cwork:thumbnail <http://www.bbc.co.uk/things/creativework-cls-maxc2-constraint#thumbnail-id2> .

  <http://www.bbc.co.uk/things/creativework-cls-maxc2-constraint#thumbnail-id1> owl:sameAs
	<http://www.bbc.co.uk/things/creativework-cls-maxc2-constraint#thumbnail-id2>
}
